version_description: Navigation. NAVIGATION!! It works online. It's just added, so allow it some mistakes and use at your own risk.
Hotfix of crash in track details.
Navigation updated again. Small and big bugs fixed all around. Added setting to restore old button layout on the map screen.
Few crashes fixed.
Few crashes fixed.
My Collections has been redesigned. Now it's possible to create nested folders!

My Collections has been redesigned. Now it's possible to create nested collections! Swipe right on bookmark or track name to change visibility.
Search screen contains last queries and nearby bookmarks.

If you experienced data loss with last update, turn on Sync again, and your data should restore.

My Collections has been redesigned. Now it's possible to create nested collections! Swipe right on bookmark or track name to change visibility.
Search screen contains last queries and nearby bookmarks.

Track recording ang GPS filters has been fixed.
Map browsing optimized and now it's smooth and fast as it should be.
Bookmark clusters provide better results.
Few rare crashes fixed.

Added support for iPhone X.
New awesome fonts for all languages in the world.
Fixed issue with black raster tiles.

Address search! Finally! Enter address, tap Done button and enjoy result.
Text rendering 2x speedup.
Arrows to display direction on tracks and routes.

Did you know, that you could swipe right on search result or bookmark to start navigation?

Database has been updated. Now we use Realm 2. Sync should work faster and without freezes.
Minor bugfixes.

Did you know, that sync could be used to backup your data on server?
Fixed database migration bugs.

Added haptic feedback on bookmark drag start.
Fixed iOS 9,10 crash on bookmark delete.

Automatic track recording during navigation.
Distance and accuracy filters for individual GPS tracks.
Better GPX format support. New tags recorded into GPX.

Fixed lots of bugs.
Hopefully, we haven't added new ones. ;)

Navigation along GPS track. It will warn you if you'll move to far from track.
Compass direction displayed as small arrow next to user location.
Direction arrows on tracks could be switched off.

New portion of bugfixes. We're working hard to make application better.

Navigation along GPS track. It will warn you if you'll move too far from the track.
Compass direction displayed as a small arrow next to user location.
Direction arrows on tracks could be switched off.

The new portion of bugfixes. We're working hard to make the application better.
Fixed lots of bugs. Let us know what we should fix next at info@galileo-app.com

1. New widget with trip monitor data. Force touch app icon to add.
2. The map is rendered at the fastest possible 60 fps.
3. New GPS track statistics: movement duration, idle duration, average movement speed, climb, descent are added.
4. Track details screen shows speed and altitude values at any point of GPS track.
5. Elevation profile for bike and pedestrian routes.
6. When you save current location as a bookmark, the app saves altitude value to the description.
7. Bookmark creation by the coordinates from the clipboard content.
Just two words: OFFLINE navigation.
Fixed minor issues in movement along the route. Optimized offline navigation speed.
Fixed minor issues in movement along the route. Optimized offline navigation speed.
Updated map style. Now you can find subway exits, benches, picnic tables and shelters on map.

Offline navigation works better for bicycle and walk routes.
Minor fixes and improvements.
Metal map renderer. It uses less memory, works faster and saves battery.

Offline navigation works better for bicycle and walk routes.
Minor fixes and improvements.

Offline navigation works better for bicycle and walk routes.
Minor fixes and improvements.

Offline navigation works better for bicycle and walk routes.
Minor fixes and improvements.

Added new bookmark icons.
Bugfixes.
Fixed bug in OpenGL ES 2.0 map renderer.
Fixed bug in OpenGL ES 2.0 map renderer.

Fixed Download Map button flickering.
Improved timestamp parsing in GPX, KML files.
Small improvements in OpenGL ES map rendering.

We revised the concept of My Collections folders and made some changes:
* Default collection isn't setup automatically now.
* All newly added bookmarks and GPS track are stored in the root of My Collections just like on the computers we've relied upon for ages.
* You still can organize your data in collections as in the past, mark any folder as default to save all newly created or imported data right there.

• Updated UI. Now the lightweight bottom drawer provides quick access to details of any object on the map. It’s scrollable and can be shown or hidden in one tap.
• Offline address search. Search by address without need to be connected to the Internet. Just update all vector maps that you want to use for offline search.
• Object's address. Get the address of any object on the map by tapping it. If the place on the map has an address and additional info, such as the opening hours, contact phone, or a website, Galileo will show these details.

• Updated UI. Now the lightweight bottom drawer provides quick access to details of any object on the map. It’s scrollable and can be shown or hidden in one tap.
• Offline address search. Search by address without need to be connected to the Internet. Just update all vector maps that you want to use for offline search.
• Object's address. Get the address of any object on the map by tapping it. If the place on the map has an address and additional info, such as the opening hours, contact phone, or a website, Galileo will show these details.

We had to rename the application. Galileo Offline Maps will now be called Guru Maps.

• With this update we have also improved name and description editing of bookmarks and tracks,
• Accelerated the performance and optimized the memory used,
• Returned the distance to the bookmarks and POIs.

• Great news for those who like to record GPS tracks. We've redesigned the track display system and now the app works fast even if you can see a thousand tracks on the map. (We have tested on 15,000 tracks)
• We also added navigation instructions in Dutch. Thank you, Remco!

• Great news for those who like to record GPS tracks. We've redesigned the track display system and now the app works fast even if you can see a thousand tracks on the map. (We have tested on 15,000 tracks)
• We also added navigation instructions in Dutch. Thank you, Remco!

• Improved text input in Search. It works well on autocorrections and Chinese input.
• Small fixes in string comparasion in Search.
• Memory usage optimized. Search on multiple maps and map rendering uses less memory.

• Improved text input in Search. It works well on autocorrections and Chinese input.
• Small fixes in string comparasion in Search.
• Memory usage optimized. Search on multiple maps and map rendering uses less memory.
• Small UI improvements and bugfixes.
• Small UI improvements and bugfixes.

1. Powerful A->B->C routing

We have improved our routing feature and glad to roll-out the new multi-stop route planner.

Now you can:
* start the route from any point on the map
* add waypoints from search or directly from the map. The app allows you to plan a route up to 50 points including start and end point.
* reorder the waypoints
* optimize the route with two or more via locations by the shortest time
* save the route for future use: edit, or navigate it later, share with your friends.
* rewind between intermediate points
* drive ring routes with the same start and end point

2. Awesome Download Maps screen

It allows you:
* to download all sub-maps in the country at once
* to pause all downloads
* to see a downloading speed
* to see map and navigation data sizes on disk
* and most importantly share maps and navigation data between devices using AirDrop. It works even without WiFi or an Internet connection.

And many small, but useful features.

Thank you for using the app! And enjoy your adventures with Guru Maps.

In the middle of the most travel season of the year, we prepared this new version with renewed features and improved user experience.

First, search results have been put back on the map, as they always were before. For example, search for accommodation and have all the available accommodation pulled up on the main map that happens to have your planned route, so that you can plan where you would potentially like to stop along the way.

Second, we have redefined the way intermediate via points is added to the route. Waypoint is a transfer point on your route that you want to go through before getting to the final target. Just tap “+Add waypoint” while planning your route, and new transit point will be added between start and final points of your route.

In addition, many minor bugs and improvements are made to please you. We hope you have a fantastic trips this summer.

In the middle of the most travel season of the year, we prepared this new version with renewed features and improved user experience.

First, search results have been put back on the map, as they always were before. For example, search for accommodation and have all the available accommodation pulled up on the main map that happens to have your planned route, so that you can plan where you would potentially like to stop along the way.

Second, we have redefined the way intermediate via points is added to the route. Waypoint is a transfer point on your route that you want to go through before getting to the final target. Just tap “+Add waypoint” while planning your route, and new transit point will be added between start and final points of your route.

In addition, many minor bugs and improvements are made to please you. We hope you have a fantastic trips this summer.

Added navigation settings.
Now you can exclude toll roads, ferries, or motorways from your route. Bicyclists can choose the type of bicycle they want to avoid riding a road bike in the dirt. And select avoid hills mode so you don't have to ride up a hill when you can bypass it.

Auto-record your trips to GPS tracks.
We won't ask after each trip whether or not to save the track. You can select this once in the navigation settings. To make sure they don't clutter your collections, you can choose a folder. And the names of the trips are now taken from the routes.

Fixed import of KML/KMZ/GPX/SQLITEDB files.
Improved map downloading in case of unstable Internet.
* New Pro map sources.
* New Pro map sources.
* Fixed import of GPX/KML/KMZ files.
Improved performance and bug fixes.

Fixed bug with custom map sources.
Fixed crashes on iOS 10 and lower.

• Added a dark theme for vector maps. Enabled automatically along with the dark iOS mode.
• Editing the route while driving. Now it's possible to add an intermediate point, create a bookmark or save the current position without leaving the navigation mode.
• Easy to visit multiple locations in the optimal order. Select several bookmarks on the the "My Collections" screen, tap the three-dots button (at the bottom) and select "Find the shortest route" option.
• The passed part of the route is now displayed in grey.
• Support for PlusCode format for coordinates
• Fixed bugs reported to support.

• Bug fixes.

• Switch to disable Dark Mode
• All users could invite friends and earn free months. Not only subscribers.

• Semi-transparent map layers supported
• GeoJSON and MapCSS supported. Read the details in the user manual: https://gurumaps.app

• Multiple fixes and improvements

• Added Google authorization method for cloud synchronization.
• Ability to hide pistes and ski lifts from the vector map if you don't need them (Settings > Map Objects).

• Online and offline routes requested at the same time. Result displayed almost instantly.
• Small fixes and improvements
• Small fixes and improvements

• Siri Shortcuts. You can create a bookmark, start and stop track recording, start navigation or search from a voice command.
• Online search globally. If there are no results from offline search (no offline map downloaded), we launch online search worldwide.
• The search by coordinates is smarter. It will forgive you if you forget to put a comma between latitude and longitude and many other misprints.

• Reverse GPS track creation.
• Ascent and Descent for tracks calculated from the barometer data.
• Tracks stats in the list on the My Collections screen.
• Embed maps and overlays could be deleted from the list.
• Siri Shortcuts. You can create a bookmark, start and stop track recording, start navigation or search from a voice command.

• Added map rotation mode by compass heading. It works in straight line navigation mode and if you press the location button 3 times.
• If there are intermediate points in the route - show time and distance to them.

• Added map rotation mode by compass heading. It works in straight line navigation mode and if you press the location button 3 times.
• If there are intermediate points in the route - show time and distance to them.

• Route planning is optimized and now checks the offline navigation data before computing.
• Minor fixes and improvements.

• Added high-res satellite map source (HERE Hybrid).
• Downloading maps does not require access to the local network.
• GeoJSON can render text for polygon centers.
• Fixed import from AirDrop.

• Added quick map switch button
• Fixed GeoJSON related bugs. Supported data from overpass-turbo.eu

We added contour lines and hill shades. These are overlays that can be used with any map. To see them, download the topographic data for your region. The size of the data on the disk is incredibly compact, for example, the topographic data for Switzerland is only 19MB.
